summary: The module provides a complete pipeline for training multi-token textual inversion embeddings with Stable Diffusion using the Flax/JAX framework. It defines a dataset class for loading images and prompts, prepares token embeddings, computes loss, runs distributed training steps, and handles model checkpointing and repository upload.
business_intent: Allow researchers and developers to create custom textual concepts that can be injected into diffusion models, enabling personalized image generation without retraining the entire model.
